Hi,

I would like to load test data from XML files, that is good way to let as
many as possible inputs test against a fixture. Now The problem is that all
cases can be only designed to be in a method ( I do the 'for loop' to let
each unit input test against the fixture.), it means that in this case many
tests happened in one method. Is there any way to execute a test in a
method?

Regards.

mmchut
